title: Outdoor adventure in Hellasgården
description: Spend some time in the beautiful Swedish nature. At Hellasgården you can go for a walk, rent a canoe or visit the sauna!

title: Climbing at Klättercentret in Telefonplan
description: Do you want to reach new heights? Challenge yourself to go climb at Klättecentret today!

title: Climbing at Klättercentret in Solna
description: Do you want to reach new heights? Challenge yourself to go climb at Klättercentret today!

title: Flottsbro Downhill Cars
description: Who says downhill cars is for kids? Treat. yo. self!

title: SMC Gokart
description: Live your secret dream of being a race car driver for the day, drive a Gokart!

title: Gokart Stockholm
description: Live your secret dream of being a race car driver for the day, drive a Gokart!

title: Bodyflight
description: Have you ever been jealous of birds? Try bodyflight! Show those suckers who's the levitating master!

title: Eriksdalsbadet waterpark
description: Go explore Eriksdalsbadet's waterpark! Here you can swim outside, even in the winter...

title: Questrooms Sankt Eriksgatan
description: Become Sherlock Holmes (or a detective of your choice) and try to solve a mystery in real life.

title: Questrooms Kocksgatan
description: Become Sherlock Holmes (or a detective of your choice) and try to solve a mystery in real life.

title: Frisbee golf
description: Can't decide if you want to play frisbee or golf? Why not do both at the same time?

title: Vespa time!
description: Screw walking! Why not try to explore Stockholm in a different way? Rent a scooter at Vespa Stockholm!

title: Go skiing!
description: Embrace the cold snow and the darkness that covers Sweden for most of the year. There is nowhere to hide anyway. Go skiing at Hammarbybacken!

title: Go for a walk on Djurgården
description: Djurgården is beautiful all year around, and there is lots to explore. Find remnants of old times and go for a nice cup of tea in one of the island's many restaurants when you need to rest your feet.

title: Go skating or skateboarding in Högdalen
description: In the mood for some radical sports? Try this amazing skatepark then!

title: Kajak at Långholmen
description: If you like water, landscapes and exercising, kajak is the right choice!

title: Kajak at Vinterviken
description: If you like water, landscapes and exercising, kajak is the right choice!

title: Padel at PDL Center
description: If you like tennis and squash, this will be fun!

title: Tom Tits Experiment
description: Become a mad scientist and try all kinds of crazy experiments!

title: Junibacken
description: Who doesn't like the fantastic world of Astrid Lindgren? Join this fantastic journey!

title: Cosmonova
description: A 3D experience that will blow your mind!

title: Tensta Parkour
description: Ready to show your Parkour moves? You'd better!

title: Delta Force Paintball
description: It's war time! Why don't you have fun with your friends playing paintball?

title: Spelapaintball Farsta
description: It's war time! Why don't you have fun with your friends playing paintball?

title: Stockholm Paintball & Äventyrscenter
description: It's war time! Why don't you have fun with your friends playing paintball?

title: Högdalstoppen
description: You can admire the view from the top of the hill at Högdalstoppen.

title: Sätraskogens naturreservat
description: If you like nature, there's a nice path from Sätraskogen to Liljeholmen. Leave your lazyness at home!
